Package com.example.checkers

Class DBUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.checkers.DBUtils
  • public class DBUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static helper functions for a database API.

    • Method Detail

      • addDataToDatabase

        public static void addDataToDatabase​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> data,
                                     com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference docRef)
        wrapper function for update and set functions in the Firestore API.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to be uploaded to the database - type of a Map
        docRef - The Document Reference to the location of the uploaded data.

      • isHost

        public static boolean isHost()
        Checks if local playerName is equal to the host name. This is done by comparing playerName and roomName.
        Returns:
        True if the player is the host of the room.

      • isWinner

        public static boolean isWinner​(java.lang.String nameOfWinner)
        Checks if the winner is the current player. This is done by comparing playerName and nameOfWinner.
        Parameters:
        nameOfWinner - The name of the winner.
        Returns:
        True if playerName is the winner of the game, else otherwise.

      • getGuestUsername

        public static java.lang.String getGuestUsername()
        Gets the "guest" field in the database which is saved in the current room (pointed by roomRef). returns "*GUEST*" if it couldn't retrieve the field (almost never happens).
        Returns:
        The field "guest", which is saved in the database in roomRef location (as a String).

      • updateBlackTurnInDb

        public static void updateBlackTurnInDb​(boolean blackTurn)
        Uploads the given blackTurn parameter to the location pointed by gameplayRef.
        Parameters:
        blackTurn - The current turn to update in the database.

      • uploadPieceLocationToDb

        public static void uploadPieceLocationToDb​(Move move,
                                           boolean isJump,
                                           int jumpX,
                                           int jumpY,
                                           boolean isKing)
        Uploads the piece location based on the format: Name | startAxis ----- endAxis ----- isKing ----- isJump ----- jumpedAxis | Value | "X-Y" ----- "X-Y" ----- True/False ----- True/False ----- "X-Y" |
        Parameters:
        move - The Move object that represents the move that was made.
        isJump - A boolean indicating if a jump has occurred.
        jumpX - If there was a jump (based on isJump), this will contain the X cord of it.
        jumpY - If there was a jump (based on isJump), this will contain the Y cord of it.
        isKing - A boolean indicating whether this piece is a king piece or not.

      • updateListview

        public static void updateListview​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> roomsList,
                                  android.widget.ListView listView,
                                  android.content.Context appContext)
        Updates the list view when a player joins the server.
        Parameters:
        roomsList - A reference to the roomsList object in Lobby activity.
        listView - A reference to the listView object in Lobby activity.
        appContext - The Application Context.

      • deleteAllDocumentsInCollection

        public static void deleteAllDocumentsInCollection​(com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference collectionReference)
        Deletes all documents in a given collection location. This is done by looping through the entire collection and removing each document by getting its reference.
        Parameters:
        collectionReference - The Reference to the collection to be deleted.

      • checkGameOver

        public static void checkGameOver​(Board board,
                                 boolean isBlackTurn)
        Checks if the game is over by one of the following conditions: if a player either has no more checkers or cannot make a move on their turn.
        Parameters:
        board - The Board object that contains the current state of the game.
        isBlackTurn - A boolean indicating the current turn.

      • gameOver

        public static void gameOver​(boolean didBlackWin)
        Handles the game over event by showing a dialog of the winner and a "Return to the lobby" button, as well as removing the game room. The removal of the room is done by the following steps: 1) The winner starts to listen for "finish" field in gameUpdates (Boolean variable). 2) The loser does all his clean-ups (such as setting the roomRef variable and changing roomName), and then uploads "finish" to gameUpdates location. 3) The winner gets the "finish" message from the loser and then removes the room completely (by calling deleteAllDocumentsInCollection())
        Parameters:
        didBlackWin - A boolean indicating the winner of the game.

      • getIsBlackTurn

        public static boolean getIsBlackTurn()
        Gets the "isBlackTurn" field in the gameUpdates location pointed by gameplayRef.
        Returns:
        The value of isBlackTurn in the database (a Boolean variable)
